node.description:
fripSide is a Japanese indie pop band. Started in 2002. They also have many other support members.  

On March 15, 2009, nao stated on the fripSide Official Website that she had graduated from fripSide. Sat and nao want to pursue different musical careers, as nao intends to pursue a solo singing career. Meanwhile Sat will continue in fripSide with a new project called, fripside: THE NEXT PROJECT. Seiyuu Yoshino Nanjo took over as the vocalist of fripSide with her debut single "only my railgun", the opening of the anime, To Aru Kagaku no Railgun. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

__Members__
- sat - [Satoshi Yaginuma](https://anilist.co/staff/111757) (八木沼悟志) - (lyrics, synthesizers, composer, arrangement) (2002-present)
- Mao Uesugi (上杉真央) - (vocals) (2022-present)
- Hisayo Abe (阿部寿世) - (vocals) (2022-present)

__Former Members__
- [nao](https://anilist.co/staff/118365/nao) (vocal, lyrics) (2002-2009)
- [Yoshino Nanjo](https://anilist.co/staff/96592/Yoshino-Nanjo) (南條愛乃) - (vocals, lyrics) (2009-2022)

Milky Holmes are - Suzuko Mimori as Sherlock Shellinford, - Sora Tokui as Nero Yuzurizaki, - Mikoi Sasaki as Hercules Barton, and - Izumi Kitta as Cordelia Glauca.  They are a seiyuu unit from/for the anime Tantei Opera Milky Holmes. When performing a live, each member wears a certain cosplay to look like her 2D counterpart from the anime.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kawasak54965532)

Hiroyuki Kawasaki is a screenwriter and novelist.

__Height:__ 169.6cm (5"7')
__Agent:__ 81 Produce

__[Website](https://www.saitosoma.com/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/somasaito/) | [Profile (81produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%95%E8%A1%8C&label=1&cell004=&name=%E6%96%89%E8%97%A4%E3%80%80%E5%A3%AE%E9%A6%AC&id=47) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SomaStaff)__

He started his singing career in 2017. Named Best Rookie Actor at the 9th Seiyu Awards (2015) and won the Singing Award at the 16th Seiyu Awards (2021).

**Non-anime roles:**
~!• [Chongyun](https://anilist.co/character/233899/Chongyun) - Genshin Impact (VG)!~
